about_the_game:
About This Game

The Welcome To... Chichester series is set in a semi-fictional world where secret organisations covertly battle each other for ideological supremacy.

This is the first in a trilogy of stories that are separate from the main series.

The Story

Taking place on the unluckiest day of the year, the protagonist and his/her friends get an invite to "The Beach". Mistaking this for a private beach party, they are sorely disappointed when instead of lounging around, everyone ends up having to search for three parts of a missing sword at a lonely, haunted bungalow.

Events become more complicated when two unwanted characters turn up.

This is a short side-story to the Welcome To... Chichester series. It would be preferable to have played the previous episodes first.

Features include :

  • Gender selection. Play as a male or female protagonist. Dialogue can change depending on gender
  • Mac version included
  • Updated story
  • Internal and Steam achievements - can you find them all ?

Characters

Cindi Eglantine

Looking forward to relaxing

Grendel Jinx

Wants to buy something cute

Hotel Receptionist

Not very happy when computer problems strike

Hotel Waitress

Allergic to cats

Hebkya

Forced to help search for various sword parts, along with Misericordia

reviews:
“The story itself appears to go off on a tangent that will make no sense at all until near the end when an explanation will clarify things – unless you pay close attention throughout, as an easily overlooked comment near the beginning provides an indication as to how what follows could be possible”
N/A – Otome Lovers

“Another crazy addition to the Welcome To... Chichester saga. I still think this would make a good anime series (I want to see the frying pans and bricks fly!) This short and sweet VN can be understood as a standalone, even though it's part of a larger series.”
Mizuki Kaito
